title: Overcoming Fear
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>*Sigh*.... We’ve done it now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Let’s figure out a way to get out of this situation.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>But Chika-chan is really looking forward to it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Ugh.... Honoka is all fired up too....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Why do we have to talk about scary stories in summer? It’s a blatant lie how people say it can cool you off.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>It’ll even make you feel hotter if you hold back from being scared.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>But I just can’t say no to Chika-chan~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>We have no choice, Riko.... Let’s train for it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>This is impossible! There’s no way we can overcome it with just training!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Get out of the bed! I won’t let you sleep tonight!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
